title: Elixovia Vitamin C Plus Face Serum ? Brightening & Hydrating Formula with Alpha Arbutin, Glutathione & Hyaluronic Acid (30ml)
description:
Transform your skincare routine with Elixovia Vitamin C Plus Face Serum, a potent blend of skin-loving ingredients designed to brighten, hydrate, and rejuvenate. This lightweight serum combines the power of Vitamin C for radiance, Alpha Arbutin to visibly brighten skin tone, Glutathione to reduce dark spots, and Hyaluronic Acid for deep, lasting hydration.

Perfect for all skin types, this serum absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, making it ideal for daily use under makeup or as part of your nighttime routine. The elegant dropper bottle ensures precise application, while the golden cap adds a touch of luxury to your skincare shelf.

Key Benefits:

? Brightens dull skin and evens out tone? Reduces appearance of dark spots and pigmentation? Provides intense hydration and plumps skin? Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula? Enriched with Vitamin C, Alpha Arbutin, Glutathione & Hyaluronic Acid? 30ml dropper bottle for easy application
Give your skin the glow it deserves with Elixovia?where science meets skincare.
